name: SAPNews
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: You can gather all the SAP news information you need in this briefing. Get the latest news from the world's largest business software company. Learn about new trends and technologies that can help make your company grow.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
